Articles.Content:
hi devs not sure if you read this but please

please please i just finished setting up my hotas and it was a far more difficult than it needed to be

thank goodness I had good software that could trick ksp into seeing what it needed to see

so the request goes as follows

1.) PLEASE review and reconfigure your code for 3rd party controllers

2.) PLEASE set the breaks to toggle as currently the only way is either to HOLD down the button rt using the mouse click on the ui .....(bad immersion breaker)

3.) PLEASE set it so camera zoom ALSO works when in iva as a kerbal as currently the only was to zoom as a kerbal is with my mouse ....(again breaks immersion and kinda deadly as you have to let go of the stick) oh and please leave zoom as a button press ie don't change it to need a axis

ps if anyone out there is in contact with the devs please pass this on as I'm sure if they were aware of these issues they would have fixed them before 1.0

anyhow hope this helps loving ksp

yours in service

the hawk from za

Edited July 10, 2015 by hawk_za
